title: Ep: 002 - Architect Patrick Costin // Technology, VR, and Healing Through Design
description: In our second episode of Architecture, Design, & Photography we sit down with Patrick Costin, Principal at Canal 5 Studios. We discuss technology, the ability to visualize spaces with virtual reality, and healing through design.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
content:encoded: In our second episode of Architecture, Design, & Photography we sit down with Patrick Costin, Principal at Canal 5 Studios. We discuss technology, the ability to visualize spaces with virtual reality, and healing through design.
